nodes.text: While in a local bar, a moisture farmer who lived on the planet Tatooine in 14 ABY overheard a conversation about the Disciples of Ragnos, a cult of Dark Jedi who were attempting to return the dead Sith Lord Marka Ragnos to life. The moisture farmer told R5-D2, his R5-series astromech droid, to record the conversation. However, the farmer became fearful of reprisals from the cult and sold the droid to a clan of Jawas before moving away.
The moisture farmer was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, which was released in 2003.
